title: SysToolsMgr
description: This is power homebrew service for webOS. It contains many useful system functions, including LED flash control, and is publicly available for any developer to use.

changes: Recoded into a Node.js service for webOS 2.0 compatibility
Service can now be fully uninstalled via orange+tap in launcher
Added faster java and luna restart functions
Updated ShellScript and CommandLine classes for bugfixes and better performance
Added a CPU temperature function for users of UberKernel
Added a frontend temporary GUI to tell you if initial installation was successful or not
Added ntp time sync function (by request)
Fixed issue affecting commandline stdout/stderr reporting
